channel.title: Items for owners
channel.description:
i couldnt find a topic stating how to do this, but if theres one outther you can remove this topic and tell me.
i made certain items on my pimpscape server base reallly good. i want to know hot to make it so only ppl with players rights of 4 can wear em. and not just regular ppl

item.title: Items for owners
item.dc:creator: @mik77 mik77
item.description:
@mik77 wrote:

kkk ziplock thnkz for the code but i dunno if have to put in item handler or in client .

if somone could just send me a code and telll me were to put it than id be happy ty.

Read full topic

item.title: Items for owners
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

You would want to put an owner right on the item.

Read full topic

item.title: Items for owners
item.dc:creator: @mik77 mik77
item.description:
@mik77 wrote:

ooooh ty so much. so all i have to do is put that in client near my commands and put the item code in it?

item.title: Items for owners
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Equip packet. Just make it where you cannot equip it.

if (playerRights < 4 && itemID = ####) {
//what you want to happen if someone less than rights 4 equips it.
}

Read full topic
